title: Otohits blog
description: News and articles about Otohits.net website. Stay up to date with the new features for your surf.

items.title: Applications - v5 is out
items.summary:
Everything is explained in the previous article. As a short explanation, old Apps were really hard to maintain and to add features in. The v5 has been designed to be flexible and easier to upgrade.

Highlights

items.summary:
The v3 of the App was launched in August 2015 on Windows. The .Net Framework was not necessary anymore, but it was a simple window without the possibility to see the navigated websites.

items.title: Hello Otohits blog
items.summary:
Since the beginning of Otohits, newsletters were the only way of communicating with you. Although it was perfect few years ago, it became more and more complicated to use.

From newsletters to blog posts

The last newsletter was sent more than 2 years ago (November 2017). It doesn't mean that wor ...

items.summary:
This is a copy of an old Othits newsletter

items.title: Newsletter - Happy birthday Otohits!
items.summary:
This is a copy of an old Othits newsletter

Otohits is 4 years old!
Let's take a moment to see what happened during this year.

We welcomed 49 000 new members as well as providing almost 7 billion visits, that's more than the 3 previous years combined!
